price: 59. Behalve onze eerste dood en zullen wij niet gestraft worden.
arabic: إِلَّا مَوۡتَتَنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: illā mawtatanā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimuʿadhabīna
